breast properly.
• The more often your baby 
breastfeeds the more milk 
will	be	made	–	it	works	on	
supply and demand. Most 
babies will want to feed 
frequently, especially in 
the	first	weeks,	so	some	
feeds will seem very close 
together.

Informal sharing of 
breastmilk 
Informal milk sharing involves 
a mother providing extra 
expressed breastmilk to 
another mother who may 
have low milk
